go_data.justification: UNC-108/RAB-2 and its effector RIC-19 are involved in dense core vesicle maturation in Caenorhabditis elegans
UNC-108/RAB-2 is highly expressed in the nervous system
The Golgi localization of RAB-2 in the cell soma
UNC-108/RAB-2 is involved in dense core vesicle maturation

go_data.term: regulation of dense core vesicle exocytosis
go_data.justification: The DCV maturation defect in unc-108 mutants may affect a DCV function unrelated to neuropeptides
The lack of DCV cargo caused by mistrafficking during DCV maturation results in signaling defects at the NMJ, leading to reduced locomotion
